attributes.action: Restore the Wildlife and the Fishing Industry to British Seas
attributes.additional_details:
Fish numbers in the seas surrounding Britain have collapsed over the decades and with them the fishing industry. Restore both through a rotation of fishing and preservation zones across these seas.

Evidence and scientific findings show that sections of the sea protected from industrial fishing do recover and recover well.

Create such protected zones and rotate between protected and fishing permissible zones so that fish numbers recover and fishermen have fish to catch.
